briefTitle: An Intervention to Decrease Fatigue Among Breast Cancer Survivors
officialTitle: Being Well, Staying Healthy: An Integrated Mind-Body Medicine Intervention to Decrease Fatigue Among Breast Cancer Survivors, PILOT STUDY
conditions: Fatigue After Adjuvant Breast Cancer Treatment
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

moderate to severe fatigue \>6 months after last chemotherapy or radiation treatment \>5 years from diagnosis

-

Exclusion Criteria:

Metastatic disease-
